page.title: 03ROAD RACE IN TADCASTER
page.content: In TADCASTER for the last three yearsthere has been a race of 10 miles and a family fun run which is three miles.The winner of the ten mile was{JEREMY HALL}who completed the distance in {48}minutes.The winner of the three mile race was Chris King. Mr.Miller,the organiser,said he did it to get money for the Methodist church.In three years he has raised { {Â£4000.}The first year,shopkeepers provided the prizes.The next two years he has got other people to give prizes for the race.The winner for the over 40's was John Nettleton of Tadcaster.Tony Dawson won the over 50's group and George Jakeman won the over 60's.There were nearly 700 runners in he road race which began at mid-day.
